snippet: With the score tied and Carlos Quentin bearing down on him, Josh Thole could not hold onto the ball, and the Padres went on to defeat the Mets.
abstract: MLB Roundup; San Diego Padres defeat the New York Mets, 3-1.
lead_paragraph: With the score tied and Carlos Quentin bearing down on him, Josh Thole could not hold onto the ball, and the Padres went on to defeat the Mets.

headline.seo: Mets Fall to Padres in San Diego
headline.main: Play at the Plate Dooms the Mets
headline.print_headline: Collision At Home Sends Mets To Defeat
